reviews.comments: Súper recomendable. Ya estoy pensando en volver. Tiene todo lo necesario y es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Un lugar maravilloso y Carolina una divina.

Excelente lugar en el corazón de San Telmo. Muy lindo apartamento, amplio, cálido. El deck superior con parrilla vale cada centavo y más también. Hay TV digital por aire (TDA) que no funciona bien, aunque en nuestro caso no tenemos nada que reprochar porque no fuimos para mirar televisión. Buen sistema de WI-Fi y un dispositivo Bose que permite escuchar emisoras por Internet. Recomiendo sin dudas este lugar.

El departamento de Alejandra es excelente. Es súper cómodo en todo sentido. Y además la terraza es hermosa, un sueño. Ella está en cualquier momento a disposición no sólo para coordinar la llegada y la partida sino también para todo lo que uno necesite. Está muy bien ubicado y además increíblemente equipado. En síntesis: un lugar muy especial. Recomiendo absolutamente!

La mejor alternativa si estás de vacaciones en Buenos Aires y quieres un lugar hermoso y con muy buena ubicación. 
Este apartamento en San Telmo es una muy grata sorpresa que brinda excelentes servicios y muy buena atención por parte de su propietaria y anfitriona.
Lugar acogedor, con una linda terraza y decoración funcional pero que a su vez brinda una muy buena experiencia.
Gracias Alejandra, gracias Carolina.

Me gustó mucho este apartamento, aunque chico pero es lo mínimo necesario para una buena estancia. Está limpio, bien iluminado, tiene una terraza. La ubicación está super bien, en el corazón de la Plaza del San Telmo.
Muchas gracias por todo Alejandra ! Agradable  terraza y buena anfitriona

Absolutely loved the apartment....

a few doors from the San Telmo market... a great part of Buenos Aires to be based in...

the roof top was amazing... my only regret was not having the time to organize an asado...

Alexnadra was a very helpful host... the apartment was clean... 

all in all... a perfect find... i'll be back...

What a fabulous place to call home for a few days! It is very cozy, is located on a fantastic street in the heart of San Telmo and has the most incredible rooftop. I would definitely stay there again if given the chance.

This apartment is exactly as advertised and an absolutely perfect location in San Telmo.  I would certainly stay again on another trip to BA.  The apartment is quiet and cool and the rooftop terrace is great.
this place has amazing vibes and is in the perfect location right across the street from san telmo market. host very communicative and easy to check in etc. loved it. terrace is awesome
Fantastic private space right in the middle of the best neighborhood!  Everything we needed.
Great, great location.  Fantastic restaurants nearby.  Entryway is stunning.  Roof is special.  Bed is very comfortable.  Market right across the street—empanadas are a must!
A good place with a nice terrace. Very good location in San Temo neighbourhood.

Alejandra's place is a charming apartment nestled in one of the best areas in San Telmo, right across from the Mercado San Telmo. Surrounded by good restaurants, good wine shops and great nightlife, you'll be in the middle of everything but feel as though you have your own personal, tranquil oasis. The private terrace is perfect for splitting a bottle among friends and enjoying the buzz of the city night. The apartment is well air conditioned, which is key in the heat of the summer. Overall, I would look to book Alejandra's place again any time I am fortunate enough to be back in Buenos Aires.
Thanks for the stay, it was great!!

This apartment is not only perfectly located and practical with everything needed, it’s also absolutely charming and magical. I can’t think of a better place to be in Buenos Aires and I’m already hoping to go back longer !!!

Great apartment right in the center of San Telmo, a really great part of Buenos Aires. The apartment has everything you could need on a trip, a fully equipped kitchen, a washing machine, its comfortable, it’s full of nice personal details. It’s very quiet even so it is in the middle of things happening in San Telmo. And it has the best terrace ever. Carolina was there for us when we needed help and provided lots of information. I will definitely recommend this place to my friends and hope I will be back myself.

This is a gem. One of my new favorites on Airbnb. The obvious highlight is the rooftop, but the indoor living space is charming and cozy too. I traveled solo and loved having the whole place to myself. I also always felt safe thanks to Carolina being nearby and the neighborhood being fairly active. 

The kitchen has everything you need. I went to beautiful Mercado San Telmo (right across the street) for cheese, bread and fruit, and down the street to the wine shop, and enjoyed my snacks on the roof for both breakfast and sun down every day. 

Do not hesitate to book this amazing apartment. I hope to be back someday! Thank you Carolina and Alejandra for sharing your lovely space and hospitality.
Great apartment in a wonderful location. Just as advertised. Would definitely stay here again.

We loved our stay in the apartment. It is very clean, comfortable and with all the right functionality to feel at home in an unfamiliar city. The location is superb! We found ourselves across the street at the market each morning for coffee as we determined where the day would take us. Communication was very easy. Highly recommmended!

Ótima localização! Fomos muito bem recepcionados! Obrigada Carol e Alejandra. E adoramos as dicas de passeio. Fizemos nossos passeios todos a pé. Caminhamos de dia e de noite e a arquitetura bucólica com a diversidade de pessoas tornou tudo muito mais belo! Embora o transporte público seja de fácil acesso, a caminhada nos permitiu curtirmos a cidade mais de perto. Voltaremos assim q nos for possível! Um abraço! Saudades!

Das Appartment von Alejadra ist ein Glücksfall! Es liegt mitten im lebhaften Zentrum von San Telmo, ist jedoch selbst sehr ruhig gelegen. Höhepunkt ist die Terrasse, die wir besonders genossen haben. Informationen für den Aufenthalt in der Wohnung und über die Umgebung liegen im Detail auf, für Fragen steht neben Alejandra auch ihre Nachbarin Carolina zur Verfügung. Die Beschreibung der Wohnung entspricht den Gegebenheiten. Wir haben uns besonders wohl gefühlt und empfehlen Alejandras Appartment ganz besonders!! Elizabeth und Andreas

Couldn’t have asked for a better location. San Telmo is so peaceful and charming and there is a ton to explore in this neighborhood. The apartment is right across the street from the San Telmo market. Hands down the best part of this airbnb is the terrace- we enjoyed drinking our coffee in the morning and wine at night up there. Carolina was very responsive and available to help us and answer questions. Thanks for a beautiful stay!
Ótimo espaço!
在布宜诺斯艾利斯最古老的圣太摩区,对面就是市场,旁边有很多商店,阳台是最大的特色,一切都好完美。
Nice space opposite markets for fruit veg and meats. Cafes nearby easy walking. Basics are in kitchen to cook most things. Really nice hosts. Roof terrace is a good space in spring

Alejandra's studio is delightful, it's very well equipped & we found it had everything we required for our week in Buenos Aires. There are two doors to access the studio, one on the street that leads through a small courtyard to the stairs leading up to the second door & into the apartment; this means it feels very safe as both doors have good locks.
The studio has plenty of natural light &, although it is located  in a busy area , it's set back from the street & it's quiet inside ...we had absolutely no problem sleeping.
Alejandra was away when we visited but communication with her was good & her delightful friend Carolina (who lives next door) was available to meet us to let us in & to help with lots of very useful information on what to see and do.
Alejandra recommended we pre book a taxi from EZE airport on line (using (URL HIDDEN) to San Telmo; this was a great tip & worked well for us; we used this service both from & to the airport.
We found we could walk from San Telmo to most of the places in Buenos Aires, that we wanted to see; sure we walked a long way on some days but it was very interesting to be among the people & to  soak up the street life & the  architecture. If you don't feel like walking there are buses & taxis close by.
We were very happy with Alejandra's place and we would certainly stay there again.

The apartment is great, in a very nice neighborhood! Especially the Mercado San Telmo is a great spot to drink a morning coffee and buy fruits and bread. And of course the terrace is a very nice place to start the day or end it!

The apartment is in San Telmo, which is perhaps not as chic or polished an area as Palermo, but we liked it all the better for that, being in a Buenos Aires of narrow lanes and streets and old shops not designed for the modern consumer felt more authentic to us. I think with just a few days in town getting to the heart of the town was easier achieved here. The apartment was clean and very pleasant and and contained everything we needed, and we were met at the door on arrival by a big smile and a warm welcome. 

The roof terrace is very very nice and gives great views whilst being secluded. We would recommend the place without hesitation!

We stayed in the apartment for an entire week and enjoyed the privacy and tranquility of the place as well as the relaxing atmosphere of the terrace upstairs.  Carolina prepared the place in a superb way and we immediately felt like being at home and ready to discover Buenos Aires.  The location is great.  We love San Telmo and the Market across the street offers incredible breakfasts.  Thank you for preparing our stay in such details!

Absolutely great place to stay. Location and the rooftop area make it pretty much perfect. Really loved it. 
The neighbourhood is great, the markets and stores are incredible, walked all over the city and was always happy to get back to our corner of the city. The grill was amazing too!
reviews.response: Thank you, it was great having you!

reviews.comments: I just want to say that this apartment is amazing ! Don't hesitate ... just book without waiting !

We loved staying here! The place is very cute and comfortable, and the private terraza is amazing! We definitely recommend this apartment to others and will stay here again. Alejandra and Carolina were both very accommodating and helpful. Thank you!

This is a wonderful apartment with everything you need in a terrific location.
Carolina was very kind and super helpful and Alejandra always in communication. The market over the road is a great opportunity to enjoy sitdown meals there and buy ham, bread and cheese for home supper. 
Walking around there are great places to eat (Gran Parilla on corner Chile St
our favorite and bars to sip a drink and soak up the flow of people
passing by. The rooftop terrace is surreal and such a great feature. Just do it!
A wonderful place in the middle of charming San Telmo. Can't recommend highly enough. Everything was a breeze.
Ótima estadia! As fotos correspondem perfeitamente ao apartamento! Muito bem acolhidos. Vale a escolha!!

I cannot recommend a stay in this pretty apartment enough! This was our first visit to Buenos Aires and we found the San Telmo location perfect. The apartment is surrounded by cute cafes, amazing restaurants, and of course, the amazing San Telmo markets. The apartment is delightful. It's clean, bright, and perfect for a couple. The roof is even prettier in real life. If we find ourselves in Buenos Aires again, we will definitely be staying here!
reviews.response: Glad you enjoyed it! Feel welcome to come back any time :-)

reviews.comments: Alejandra's apartment is in a great location just opposite the San Telmo market, and on a Sunday the apartment is in the perfect location for the street market! The flat itself is lovely, as in the photos with a comfy bed and well stocked kitchen. We were able to check in very promptly and there was a place for us to store our bags upon check out. I would thoroughly recommend staying at Alejandra's apartment.

O apartamento de Alejandra é otimo! Exatamente como se vê nas fotos! O bairro é um charme e conta com deliciosos  restaurantes e com várias linhas de ônibus perto do apto. Alejandra foi muito solícita desde a reserva, assim como Carolina, que nos recebeu e nos ajudou na hora da partida. Suuuper recomendo :)
Alejandra's place was very well equipped. Great location for night life. Would highly recommend. Thanks again :)

This place was great. Loved the terrace, loved the location (so great right in the middle of San Telmo) - the main market right across the street - and lots of stuff near by. 

Me and my brother stayed here and it was just what we needed. Alejandra was super easy to get a hold of for check in and check out - no issues at all. 

I would recommend for others to stay here.

Alejandra's flat is perfectly situated in San Telmo, in that it is steps away from great restaurants, wine shops, coffee shops, bakeries, and the Mercado, as well as being very, very quiet. The space is super clean, modern, and comfy. The roof top terrace is private and lovely. Carolina looked after us, gave us great tips, and lucky for us, speaks excellent English. Highest recommendation for these hosts and this flat.
reviews.response: Thank you Kelly, it was great having you!

reviews.comments:
This apartment was amazing! Exactly like the pictures and just a joy to stay in. Alejandra and Carolina were great :) Carolina helped us with everything we needed, I only wish we could have stayed longer!
Muchísimas gracias por todo!
Ocorreu tudo muito bem, gostamos muito de tudo.

This is so tastefully decorated and so beautiful.  Alejandra and her co-host leave everything you may need and they are so accommodating in answering your questions in a timely manner.  The location is outstanding, close to everything, including San Telmo markets, public transit and tango!  I highly recommend this place and I will return the next time I am in Buenos Aires.

Great area to stay in BA with large choice of restaurants and bars within walking distance. Apartment was surprisingly quiet though, being in the centre of things and the upstairs terrace was an amazing space to hang out in. Carolina was easy to deal with and accommodating on check-out process, also handy that she was right next door.
Absolutely amazing!  Ideal location in San Telmo.  If I ever make it back to BA, I can only hope Alejandra's place is available again.

This apartment is great for couples, with the best feature the private rooftop terrace.

We also found the location to be perfect: San Telmo Sunday markets were only 1 block away; a short cab ride to La Boca; and short walk to the nearest metro station to get around the city easily.

Carolina managed the apartment and assisted us upon arrival and departure - she was very flexible with our arrangements. Alejandra also reached out to us to ensure our stay was fine.

Highly recommended!

The place really is as beautiful as the photos. Every morning, we had french pastries from the San Telmo market conveniently just across the street, while enjoying the lovely view. The location made it easy to walk to most places in San Telmo. The space had everything we needed and we would highly recommend it!
This apartment is the Best location! Especially on market days! Had a lovely stay.
Everything was wonderful. Can't beat the views !
Just about perfect - everything a great airbnb should be.

The descriptions were all accurate and honest...wifi always worked excellently... very clean and efficient interior...the patio is a whole other experience...lots of great services close at hand...a very good Buenos Aires experience...

The studio is amazing and the terrace is stunning! I also loved the location in the Heart of San Telmo, a beautiful and historic neighborhood . We had a wonderful time, thanks Alejandra and Carolina!!
Pictures do not do this apartment justice. A perfect location in San Telmo. The market is across the street. Great food and cocktails within a ten minute walk.
Beautiful apartment in a lovely neighbourhood. We had a great time there! Thank you Alejandra & Caroline.
Just perfect!

Alejandra's place was my absolute favorite place to stay during my month in Argentina.  It's gorgeous, well maintained, and surprisingly quiet for being right next to one of the larger BA markets. There's great food and coffee right outside the door. A quick 10 minute walk and you're on the subte. Alejandra is easy to communicate with and the neighbors are super sweet. I cannot wait to go back and stay there again.

This place has an incredible location! It was so convenient for walking, shopping, museums, tango and more. Very comfortable and Alejandra and Carolina were there to help us at any time. We highly recommend this place.
Apartment was lovely and perfect for our visit!  We loved the restaurants and cafes nearby and appreciate all the help provided! Such a great location and beautiful apartment.  Thank you!!

Alejandra was super nice and easy to coordinate with. She let us check-in early and prepared us coffee while waiting! The perfect host. We had an amazing time, the apartment is lovely, clean and very well decorated. We really enjoyed the rooftop and the outdoor shower and would definitely book this place again!
reviews.response: Thank you! it was great having you :-)

reviews.comments: Our host was extremely welcoming and always quick to respond to any minor query that we had (such as how to lower the outdoor barbecue grill - very easy, we just hadn't thought to look at the outside of the BBQ wall!!).  The apartment was just as described and we immediately felt very at home.  The terrace was a great place to start and finish the day and as a place to socialise.  The neighbours were very friendly (especially their cat) and helpful and the inner courtyard location made the whole setting feel very serene and secure.  The position of the apartment was perfect - we loved San Telmo - the best barrio in Buenos Aires in our view - full of character and lots to see, do and buy, from street markets to interesting boutiques.  And within walking distance to the centre.  The SUBE card that Alejandra left (along with a bottle of fizz, fruit and real coffee) got us going and we didn't look back - out every day exploring and then back to buy our supper at the wonderful San Telmo market.  We definitely want to come back - thanks for being a great host, Alejandra.
reviews.response: Thank you Ann for your lovely review. I enjoyed very much hosting you as well. And thank you sooo much for leaving the apartment so clean and tidy, I appreciate it a lot! Hope to have back soon, cheers

reviews.comments: Authentisch, gemütlich, beste Lage direkt gegenüber des San Telmo Market und gleich um die Ecke der Plaza Dorrego, tolle Dachterrasse zum Relaxen !!! Zur Begrüßung gab's einen Obst Korb und Wein. Vielen Dank. Es ist sehr ruhig, man hört keine Autos! Alejandra war bei Fragen immer für uns da und sehr hilfsbereit. Sehr empfehlenswert !!!

This is one my favorite Airbnb stays ever. The apartment was outstanding. Adorably furnished, very cozy, awesome amenities, wonderful open windows, and incredibly comfortable. The rooftop deck was a total pleasure. We enjoyed sunsets up there while relaxing on the outdoor sofa and enjoying the great view. I would book this place again just for that great terrace. The location was superb. We visited lots of areas of Buenos Aires but I can definitely San Telmo was by far my favorite. It's near lots of great restaurants and the "older" neighborhood is so hip and fun. It was a great hub for us to explore Buenos Aires. Plus it's within walking distance to a great park that was one of the highlights of our stay. Alejandra is truly a great host: vey communicative, provides lots of helpful info, and organized. I would totally stay at this apartment again if I ever came back to Buenos Aires. I fell in love with both the apartment and the neighborhood.
Lovely apartment and great neighbourhood. The place is well equipped and the terrace is just perfect. Alejandra is a really nice host.
reviews.response: Thank you, it was great meeting you, same as the drinks we had together :-)

reviews.comments: This was our first airbnb experience and first BA visit.  We were nervous but pleasantly surprised.  This apartment is exactly as described, but we found some things to be better than we expected: if you're wanting to stay in the San Telmo area, this is the best location.  It's perfectly situated on a quiet, but not remote, street in the very lively area of San Telmo.  We loved the host and felt she welcomed us well and provided more amenities than we expected. (It may seem small, but having things like a hairdryer on the wall and a small mirror and umbrella to use were nice details that this place provided.) The bed was comfortable. I was very wary about the mosquitoes that were mentioned in precious posts, but didn't get one in the apartment. Highly recommend!

Alejandra's apartment is located in a beautiful historic part of Buenos Aires. It was easy to get around the city from there with taxis, subway, and buses and there is plenty to do and eat within the neighborhood itself. The apartment was very nice and clean and the upstairs patio was perfect for hanging out and soaking up the sunshine or winding down in the evenings. The apartment has everything you could possibly need and Alejandra made sure we were comfortable and in for a pleasant stay. Would definitely recommend!

Alejandra's apartment was the perfect place to stay for my introduction to Buenos Aires. The apartment is beautiful and spacious, greenery everywhere and the rooftop has a breathtaking view. Alejandra was wonderful to communicate with, she was flexible with my travel schedule and greeted me when I arrived and departed. The neighborhood is also great. Even though San Telmo is filled with tourists, the apartment is in a quieter and more low key part of the area. I would love to come back to Buenos Aires and stay at Alejandra's again!
reviews.response: Thank you, it was great hosting you. Hope you come back :-)

reviews.comments: Alejandra is a great host. She is flexible with check in and out time. She is very helpful and has great communication. It is obvious she takes great pride in keeping her place in good shape. Everything is exactly how it looks in the photos. The Terrace is an awesome place to hang out and relax. You can hear the tango music from the restaurants and bars that are in walking distance from the apartment. The location is unbeatable!

Alejandra's apartment is the best! The location is perfect, it's clean, bright, the rooftop terrace is beautiful and Alejandra herself is easy to contact and very nice. We lived staying at her place and will definately choose for it again if we come back!
reviews.response: Thank you, it was great meeting you. Perhaps we'll meet again in NL sometime :-)

reviews.comments:
Alejandra clearly cares about her apartment and the comfort of her guests. She went out of her way to accommodate my arrival and she immediately returned my messages both before and during the rental. She is kind, thoughtful and helpful, and seems adamant about ensuring her renters' satisfaction. 

The photos of the apartment are entirely accurate; it's a clean, vibrant, lovely place to stay. I, myself, like to cook, and the kitchen has everything one needs. The bed is comfortable, the water is hot (if/when you need it), and the terrace is wonderful. 

The apartment's location is remarkable (in the middle of the colorful San Telmo neighborhood). Considering the cacophony of the neighborhood, noise from the street doesn't seep through nearly as much as I thought it would. That said, the building itself can produce a variety of sounds: I was there for a week and on some days it was absolutely silent, while on others I could easily hear the neighbors going about their daily lives. Not a complaint, simply a fact of life. 

Kudos to Alejandra for the screens on the windows. I was amazed by the amount of mosquitoes so here are some words of advice:
-the mosquitoes will come at dusk, so if you want to be on the terrace, prepare yourself. There are some repellents in one of the kitchen drawers.
-never, never, leave a door open to the outside. If you want the terrace door open, use the pull-down screen.
-I took huge precautions and I still had mosquitoes buzzing in my ears a few of the nights. In this case, the ceiling fan above the bed will help to blow them away.

It would be difficult for me to imagine not staying here again. Great location, hassle-free rental, perfect host, lovely apartment...all at a decent price.

Le quartier est sans doute est des plus agréables, et l'appartement d'Alejandra a été un vrai paradis pour nous. Elle-même s'est montrée extrêmement agréable et attentionnée. Les photos correspondent parfaitement au charme de l'endroit, tout est bien conçu, et le lit est excellent. C'est avec regret que nous avons du partir !

Alejandra made us feel very welcome and was available and friendly if we needed help- though we didn't need much. Th aprtment is great and extremely convenient. Easy walking to the centre of the city, buses at the street corner, and  15 minute walk to the underground at Independencia and 9 de Julio. With this you can go all over the city easily.
The aprtment is right across the street from the Mercado San Telmo where youcan get any food item you need to cook. The french bread shop in this Mercado is outstanding with croissant, pain au chocolat, baguette etc as good as you will find in Paris. 50 yards down the street is a fresh pasta maker and sho- La Leonesa- where the pasta is as good as you will get in Rome or Florence. San Telmo is a delight and a great base from which to visit the city. We felt immediately very much at home.
Alejandra was an excellent host and the apt was as described. We loved it!
Superb studio apartment in an excellent location and a wonderful host.
Alejandra was amazing! She checked in us during our stay, and helped me make a call when I couldn't get through to a restaurant. This place is an amazing location! The best!
Fantastic apartment in a lovely neighborhood with a very accommodating hostess (& a really comfortable bed)!  Would recommend to everyone I know!

Alejandra's apartment was the absolute perfect home for us for the week we spent in BA. The most delicious chorizo sandwiches, the Mercado San Telmo, and the street market on Sundays - all within steps. A charming, awesome, unique neighbourhood with lots of great shops and restaurants. The apartment itself was clean, bright, quiet and felt super safe and separated from the street, which was so nice. Lots of space for two people, and the terrace (though it was a little cold when we were there) is adorable. Alejandra was so kind to meet us in person for arrival and departure, and checked in with us during the week to make sure we were enjoying our stay. Would absolutely stay here again!!
reviews.response: Thank you! It was lovely to host you :-)

reviews.comments:
I have stayed in three seperate airbnb properties in Buenos Aires and for the combination of location, value and quality of the premises this easily comes first.  The small apartment is well appointed and homely with a great small kitchen and everything you need for a stay in the city.  The roof terrace is a real winner and I even managed to use the asado for a BBQ with friends.

The location, in the heart of San Telmo, is perfect yet despite being in a bustling precint the apartment is remarkebly quiet.  Arrival and departure was seamless and Alejandra was readily available by email.
The apartment was beautiful, and in a great location right in the heart of San Telmo. Alejandra was very accommodating. Overall a great experience.

We absolutely loved this place and San Telmo. Perfect apartment for a couple. Close to so many bars and restaurants and the metro. The terrace is such a bonus, unfortunately we didn't get to use it as was too cold, but great for summer travellers for sure. Alejandra was the best host, quick to respond and super helpful. 
Buenos Aires recommendations - Parilla Food Tour, BA Bike Tour, Tango lesson and show.

Great place! Fully equiped kitchen and a very nice terrasse. Very near to the San Telmo Market. Alejandra left allot of informations about Buenos Aires and was very flexible, since we booked one more night. Carolina, her neighbour was also very helpfull.
Thanx, we had a great time in Buenos Aires and at your place!
What a wonderful stay! Great location. San telmo was by far the best neighborhood. Lovely balcony.

We love, love, LOVED staying in Alejandra's gorgeous apartment. Located in the heart of San Telmo (the jewel of Buenos Aires!), the cozy unit is within a few blocks' walking distance of the barrio's most highly recommended cafés, bars, and restaurants--not to mention directly across the street from the famous San Telmo Market! We had the best time strolling around the neighborhood (in fact, we didn't go much futher than 8 blocks or so), and we were genuinely heartbroken when we had to move on to our next destination!

Alejandra was a fantastic host and went out of her way to make our visit more comfortable. Despite traveling elsewhere during our stay, she was quick to respond to our questions via email and left us a super helpful set of tips, instructions, and recommendations on the dining room table. Her neighbor (who checked us in) was a HUGE help as well, especially when the gas went out for a few minutes and we needed to light the pilot light.

Should we ever return to Buenos Aires, Alejandra's place will be the first we'll go!

O apartamento era exatamente como estava no no anúncio e nas fotos. Foi muito fiel. É um apartamento muito agradável e aconchegante, me senti em casa. Possui todos equipamentos e funcionalidades necessárias e tudo realmente funcionou bem, gás, aquecimento, chuveiros. Achei o valor muito bom, um custo x benefício fantástico! Mesmo não estando presente, a Alejandra foi atenciosa o tempo todo. Gostei muito e voltarei! Vale a pena.

Cute little place right across the street from the Mercado de San Telmo!

The neighbor was very friendly and helpful, but her dog barked a lot and the walls were kind of thin.

Otherwise, Alejandra's instructions and recommendations lists were very helpful.

Thanks Alejandra!
reviews.response: Oh, that is very unfortunate. Anyways the neighbor was taking care the dog of a friend for a couple days, so is not there anymore.

reviews.comments: Our host was not present but made arrangements for a neighbor to help us get settled in. The apartment is fantastic and right off the main street in San Telmo, close to everything in that district. Highly recommend it!

Apartment is located in the great location of San Telmo, half block of the amazing San Telmo Sunday's fair. With a variety of cafes, restaurants and antique shops. Once you enter the property the ambience changes from city life to a quiet place to relax, enjoy and rest. The apartment is equipped with everything needed to make you feel home. The apartment also has an amazing terrace ready for a good asado, picada and wine. The owner Alejandra is great, the communication with her was excellent. Always prompt on her replies and  positive interaction. The direct host in Buenos Aires, Carolina was great, helpful and very nice. Overall our experience in this apartment was great. I highly recommend it and most likely will be my stay place next time I come here again. Isis DeJesús

Alejandra appartment is amazing, really confortable and Well decorated. The roof top is really nice. The area is perfect just in front of San Telmo market. Everything is at a walkable distance. We had a really good stay in this lovely flat. The only problem was the Tv which didn't work and a bad wifi connexion.
reviews.response:
I offered to fix the TV, but you said it wasn't necessary. Anyways is fixed now.
First time I hear the wifi is bad, but ok, I'll take notice.
Regards

reviews.comments: Our host Alejandra was very clear, thorough and caring with her communication with us.  She was helpful in her instructions at her apartment about places to eat and also about studio.  She was very informative.  She made us feel at home with her emails and messages.

The apartment was great, provissioned with everything I needed, and Alejandra communicated well. I assume that if I'd needed anything, that she would have been on top of it. I'll definitely stay here again.

The Private Terrace was an ideal location to base ourselves when we explored Buenos Aires. It was an easy walk to the Subte train stations and we were also opposite a mercado with fresh produce which was great when we decided we wanted a home cooked meal for a change (Alejandra's fully equipped kitchen made cooking a lot easier too). 

We were there in late April and it was quite cold outside but the apartment was always warm. We loved what she did with the space, especially with the roof top terrace! 

Alejandra is responsive and was great with answering all our questions. We are also very grateful for her flexibility with our check in and check out times (we arrived close to 1am  due to changes in our flights and there was still someone there to greet us and show us around). Would definitely recommend this apartment for anyone wishing to explore Buenos Aires!
This apartment was adorable and perfect. We loved the location and everything we needed was there in a most pleasing setting. Alejandra is a very conscientious host. Many thanks.

This flat is corresponding very well to its description. It is very well located in the central part of BA with many shops, market, restaurants and bars around. it is very quiet with a nice decoration, very pleasant terrace on the top. Alejandra is very helpful and responsive. We appreciated that she offers a nice bottle of wine as a welcome present :)  We recommend this place!

We loved our stay at Alejandra's. The apartment was lovely, perfect for two. The location was great and San Telmo ended up being one of our favorite parts of Buenos Aires. Alejandra has thought of everything her guests might need. She also provides a list of local places to eat and has several guidebooks in the bookshelf. We would stay here again for sure!

Alejandras apartment was absolutely stunning and the best place we  could wish for. Everything was clean, new and as advertised on the pictures. Even though we did not meet her in person, all information was well prepared and we never felt "left alone". San Telmo itself is a nice, feel-good, quite hipsterish neighbourhood with tons of restaurants and places to go out and have a good time.

Alejandra's apartment is wonderful! We loved the unique space, and it is in a great location. It is literally a block from the famous Sunday market and right across the street from a cute little market where you can get coffee, cheese, meat and other items. We loved getting meat from the butcher and cooking it on the terrace grill while the sun set over the city.  It is easy to catch a cab to other neighborhoods, and it is very close to all the San Telmo restaurants, bars and shops. The space is very cute, has great wifi, and was very easy to find. Alejandra was very easy to ahold whenever we had questions. I highly recommend this charming space!

Le logement d alejandra est une merveille niché en plein Coeur de san telmo. Les photos sont fidèles a la réalité. L accueil a été effectué par une de ses amies, très aimable. La terrasse est un plus indéniable pour boire un verre le soir. Un site a recommandé!

The place is in a good area in San telmo. A lot of things are in walking distance. The rooms were clean and looked as nice as the pictures. The contact with alejandra was easy and is was not a problem that we arrived really early in the morning. We had a great stay.

The apartment was as described.  The agent met us and was flexible to work around our flight delays. Bed was comfortable, the aircon worked well, and the roof terrace was really relaxing.   A welcome bottle of wine was appreciated!
